li.text:
Mother of the Dryads (Gaurkyries) - basic settings are inherited from ordinary Valkyries, here the settings are only for mothers of dryads.

The mother of dryads can spawn dryads, just like a normal tree, there are only a few differences.

<color=#a2adff>- The maximum number of wild dryads is always 0.
- The maximum number of dryads can be 6.
- The connection level never drops.
- Produce Gauranlen seeds once per year.
- Don't spawn "Rubbish" like normal Valkyries.
- Has a development system (ranking) separate from the Valkyries.
- Immune to extreme temperatures. Instead of heatstroke and hypothermia, they get "saturation" which temporarily enhances them.
- Move very slowly.
- Receive dryad bonuses from the "Gauranlen supremacy" meme (Alpha memes)</color>

<color=#ffc832>Known bugs:
- At the start of the game, an error related to the tree is displayed. Just ignore it.
- The dryad tracker may contain a non-existent dryad. Appear when starting through pods. Save-Load should fix the problem
- When a pawn interacts with itself (changing the type of dryads as an example), a yellow error appears. Ignore it.</color>

No critical bugs found.

Dryad mother can appear in an event or custom start.
